item.title: Home Depot blames the weather for disappointing sales, but that’s not the only issue
item.description: Home Depot’s stock dropped toward a seven-month low after an earnings miss and a downbeat outlook.

item.title: Why the Fed’s December rate decision isn’t the stock market’s biggest worry

item.title: Loop Capital upgrades Alphabet as worries dissipate around search revenue growth
